GraphInstance.Documentation:
This is a pair of cells called x and y, with x being a leader
```` id:"x" id:"y" +------------+ +------------+ .-->| in + .--->| in + | +------------+ / +------------+ | |P leader=1 | / |P leader=0 | | |S hot=? | / |S hot=? | | +------------+ / +------------+ | | out |--' | out |---. | +------------+ +------------+ | | | '----------------------------------------------' ````
When activated, the token will pass between the two devices, with x starting hot. When a message is sent, but has not been received, both devices will be cold, as the token will be in the network.
